title: S.R. Construction Delivers Feed-in at World’s first LC-Max Residue Upgradation Facility at Visakh Refinery
excerpt: A major milestone in refining technology, S.R. Construction successfully commissions the feed-in systems for the world's first LC-Max facility, enhancing efficiency and sustainability.

children.text: S.R. Construction is proud to announce the successful delivery of feed-in systems for the landmark LC-Max Residue Upgradation Facility. This project marks a significant step forward in heavy crude processing technology.

title: S.R. Construction Wins Major Order for Hydrocarbon Onshore Business
excerpt: Securing a significant contract to expand onshore hydrocarbon infrastructure, reinforcing our leadership in the energy sector.

children.text: We have secured a major order for the Hydrocarbon Onshore Business. The scope involves Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) for a state-of-the-art gas processing plant.

title: S.R. Construction secures a key role in TenneT’s landmark Offshore Wind Programme
excerpt: Partnership with TenneT marks a strategic entry into large-scale European offshore wind energy projects.

children.text: S.R. Construction has been selected as a key partner in TenneT's ambitious 2GW Program. This offshore wind initiative will supply green energy to millions of households across Europe.
